titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for the forgiveness of Perkins loans to members of the armed services on active duty.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 1/31/2001--Introduced. Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for student loan forgiveness, under the Federal Perkins Loan program, for members of the Armed Forces on active duty.
